website_summaries.verdict: The idea behind the MoGo Talk XD is clever, but we don't think the features fully justify its retail price.
pros: The MoGo Talk XD is a solid protective iPhone case with a built-in Bluetooth headset
The headset has a comfortable fit and comes with a variety of earbud tips
cons: The MoGo Talk XD lacks a few advanced Bluetooth headset features like A2DP and multipoint
You have to use the phone to adjust the volume
Call quality was also not as good as we hoped

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound - never lost!
customer_reviews.text: In that I travel a lot and some of the states where I drive have laws against holding the phone while driving it is important that I have my Bluetooth Headset. The MoGo is always with my phone which is very convenient. I am also very impressed with the sound quality. It sounds better to me and to those with whom I am talking. The only improvement I would suggest is to allow the headset to be charging at the same time as the phone, not as it is currently designed, to be charged separately. I recommend this item highly.
customer_reviews.author: Barry D

customer_reviews.title: This bluetooth headset is so/so
customer_reviews.text: The ear boom takes some getting use to. The additional ear adjustments are flat and not round like traditional ear pieces. The best part about this product is not having to worry about a drop call (so far). The battery; however is the worst, it doesn't more than a day with usage. FYI...I would definately check out other ear pieces before giving this one a try. Especially in the case of wanting a longer battery time.
customer_reviews.author: L B

customer_reviews.title: ONLY IF YOU ALSO NEED THE PROTECTIVE CASE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bluetooth that has high quality reception and transmission. If you already have a protective case. or plan to purchase such a case from a different supplier, this may not be the bluetooth for you because the case just becomes a holder for the bluetooth while you charge it. Regardless, this is a great bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Everything in one package.
customer_reviews.text: I love the MoGo Headset/Case because everything is kept in the same, easily accessible spot. This is the second one I have owned. The first was for the iPhone 3. The call quality is great, both sending and receiving. You can summon Siri with one click of the button. When you're finished it slips right back into the recess provided by the case. The only reason I have it 4 instead of 5 stars is the case is a bit slick. The grip of the shell has greatly improved over the previous edition but still needs some work. Overall, I would (and do frequently) recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not staying in place.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it stays with the phone even when not using it. But the ear pieces aren't staying in my ear. They keep on slipping out, especially when I eat something. Wish it had something to fit on it to go over my ear so it would stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea, but this thing stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Cool idea, but this thing stinks! The delay on the blue tooth made it unusable. Also the earpiece did not stay in my ear well. The case started to come apart after a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Bootiesr

customer_reviews.title: The product came in pretty quickly. I really like how it clamps to ...
customer_reviews.text: The product came in pretty quickly. I really like how it clamps to the phone. I went through about 4-5 because I kept losing them. This way I always know where it it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these as gifts for family members who have iPhones. My review is based solely on what they've told me. Both are very pleased with the product and how it works with their phones. They began using the MoGo Talk XD Bluetooth Headset and the Protective Case immediately and continue to do so with no problems, finding the protective case to be an especially welcome feature.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great  love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a great ear price and case love it too will be ordering from there again thanx u soooo much love it love it love it love it love
customer_reviews.author: theritia clark

customer_reviews.title: love the hard shell
customer_reviews.text: This case is great becuz you cant misplace the bluetooth. However, if your a women and have nails it is very easy to take out the bluetooth. My husband keeps his nails short. Therefore, he CAN NOT take the bletooth out at all !! Great concept, wish they made for other phones other than IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Estrada-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product two month ago, it's already broken. The headphone won't charge anymore. I tend to lose headphones, so the product seemed like a really good idea. Too bad that it is executed poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Yiting Pan

customer_reviews.title: slick look
customer_reviews.text: is the only way not to loose your bluetooth put it back when done with it and i always know where it is !
customer_reviews.author: douglas molina

customer_reviews.title: MoGo Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: It a good device, but battery level suck. I love it, but I charge it everyday and I barley use it. Don't understand why the battery always low.
customer_reviews.author: Cclark1982

customer_reviews.title: Useless Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth will not stay in my ear so I have not been able to use it. I have tried many times so it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I never heard of this brand before. I bought this item looking at its reviews. However, it is so uncomfortable to wear and there's virtually no noise cancellation. The quality is really cheap and not worth the price. Never buy this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Not only is it compact and my bluetooth isn't at the bottom of my purse when I need it but it works amazingly well. I have tried 4 different Bluetooths lately trying to find one that sounded good on both ends, used a standard charger, and fits inside the ear for better hearing. This is is. I love it so much and am amazed at the affordability of something so sleek and smart.
customer_reviews.author: AKERSMDA

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've been hesitant to get a Bluetooth for my iPhone, but this one caught my attention based on price and consistently good reviews, so I bought one a week ago and no doubt, it works well, it's simple to set up, and for the price it's one of the best bargains I've found.
customer_reviews.author: SundanceJL

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but the case began seperating after 2 weeks. However, i love the headset so i leave it charged and use it as a spare in the car.
customer_reviews.author: MoManny

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: We can not use it on iphone 4s. I bought it for 4s and now I am using it for my wife's iphone 4. it is working good with good battery back up.
customer_reviews.author: Kumarandurai Selvaraj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great phone protection and convenient for ear piece storage and charging.
customer_reviews.author: Maiaamada

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: very good i love it . its work very good. no complain at all. i will tell every one buy this
customer_reviews.author: mdsultan ahsan

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A PIECE OF JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: After four months, my Mogo gave out. Not recharging. It was hell getting a response from the company as to where to send it back and get a replacement. I got the replacement and within TWO months, again NOT recharging. I have not been able to get any response. I paid $125 for this and am feeling royally RIPPED OFF. The idea is great having the earpiece fit into a case that is on the phone, but technically, its a piece of JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Nitebird

customer_reviews.title: Great case/bluetooth combo
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth earpieces always annoy me because they're an odd shape, and tend to get damaged when they're in your pocket or somewhere similar. This brilliant case/bluetooth combo design eliminates that problem, while only creating minimal extra bulk in the case. The bluetooth unit itself is fantastic- great sound quality, comfortable ear pieces (after you figure out which of the provided tips fits your ear best) and battery life seems good so far. Nice work, MoGo!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Triebe

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I got my Mogo case/headset about 2 weeks ago and have been loving it! The bluetooth has a great quality sound and it truly is the thinnest I've ever seen. Being able to place it back in the case helps me from losing it (I've lost several bluetooth headsets in the past...). The only thing I will say is that the case is thin, but substantial. However, I actually like this about it because I know that it will also protect my phone well (rather than those thin cases that don't protect much). All in all, just plain brilliant. Worth every penny : )
customer_reviews.author: Robert Macauley

customer_reviews.title: I'll never lose my bluetooth again!
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not take the time to review products that I have purchased, but I had to make an exception for this one. The Mogo Talk has solved my bluetooth headset issues by allowing me to dock and charge it right in the case! I love the way the headset fits in my ear. I am on the road a lot and this product has saved me a lot of time and aggravation since I have had it. I have been recommending it to all my friends as a must have for iPhone 4 users.
customer_reviews.author: colleen ryan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, no support and no warranty
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a previous version for the iphone 3 and I loved it. Warranty was 2 years and support was good. I bought this for my new iphone4 from Expressbuy123 and can't recommend the product or the seller. Product stopped charging after 2 months. Manfacturer is out of business and Expressbuy123 won't honor a refund. Amazon won't either. Buyer beware!!! No way to rate 0 .
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Really useful product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product - works really well and is easy to use. I wanted to get a headset so I can talk safely in the car, but always thought it was more dangerous trying to find the headset when I get a call then just grabbing the phone. This is good because if your phone is in reach, so is the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful All in One Case
customer_reviews.text: What a great compliment to my Iphone 4. I am always losing my bluetooth earpieces but with this product I just set it right in the back of my phone so I always know where it is. It is very thin so it added minimal bulk to my phone. The sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jensen

customer_reviews.title: You won't lose this bluetooth!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who "misplaces" keys, train cards, phone numbers, etc. I wouldn't buy any other bluetooth headset. I can keep my headset in an easy to store case and will always know where to find my bluetooth. You get one product with two great functions! A nice case and a reliable headset.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the MogoTalk XD for my iPhone 4 and am really impressed with it. I've never been a big bluetooth user but the fact that I am able to store it right on the back of my phone is super convenient! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all-in-one product! What a great idea to have your headset store within your case and charge while docked. I love the forward thinking and ease of use and would recommend this to any/everyone!
customer_reviews.author: dbswifty

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: The mogo bluetooth headset saves me time and frustration. NO more lost bluetooths. The charging capability right in the case is great. I have been quite happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rita C

customer_reviews.title: Groovy.  No I don't lose the damn thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have lost more than a few bluetooth headsets. It is the running joke in my family. This design rocks. The headset fits sleekly into the case. Brilliant. The quality of the materials is better than average. The sound quality is better than average. A perfect gift this holiday season for those knuckleheads like me that lose these things all the time. Thanks Mogo for an excellent design.
customer_reviews.author: G. C. Vachon

product_meta.title: MoGo Talk XD Bluetooth Headset and Protective Case for iPhone 4 (Black) (Fits AT&T iPhone)
product_meta.description:
MoGo Talk XD is the only high performance Bluetooth headset and case custom designed for the iPhone 4. When in action, the headset sits comfortably in-ear and delivers high fidelity crystal clear conversations. The headset also features Talk and Dock functionality enabling the headset to fold flat and snap seamlessly and securely into an accompanying, low-profile iPhone protective case.

AMAZON.COM


The MoGo Talk XD for iPhone 4 combines a Bluetooth headset and a protective case in one thin, seamless design. The compact headset snaps directly into the case, where it can connect to a charging system, so it's always ready for use. The headset is equipped with SmartAudio technology for noise reduction and SoundShape Ear Buds for a comfortable fit.

MoGo Talk XD
At a Glance:

 * Bluetooth headset stores and charges right on your iPhone 4
 * Flexible SoundShape Ear Buds form to your ear
 * Voice enhancement technology enables clear conversations
 * Balanced armature drivers provide high-quality sound
 * Rugged case with grip edge protects your iPhone 4

MOGO TALK XD BLUETOOTH HEADSET AND PROTECTIVE CASE FOR IPHONE 4
Protect your iPhone 4 against damage with the hard polycarbonate case.View larger.The Bluetooth headset snaps onto the included Grip Case for storage and charging (a separate cable or dock is required to charge the iPhone).View larger.INTEGRATED HEADSET AND PROTECTIVE CASE FOR IPHONE 4
The MoGo Talk XD keeps your iPhone 4 protected while delivering clear, high-fidelity audio. This integrated communication system includes a Bluetooth headset that folds flat and snaps directly onto the included Grip Case, where the headset can be stored and charged using the included micro-USB cable (a separate cable/dock is required to charge the iPhone). The felt-lined case cradles your iPhone 4 and protects the back and sides of the phone against drops, scratches, and bumps.

This innovative, all-in-one design means your headset will always be exactly where you need it--attached to your iPhone 4. The headset sits flush in the case and is so thin and light you'll barely know it's there.

POWERFUL AUDIO TECHNOLOGY FOR CLEAR CONVERSATIONS
For outstanding fidelity, the MoGo Talk XD employs SmartMonitor in-ear technology, which uses the same balanced armature drivers usually reserved for professional-quality in-ear monitors. The built-in SmartAudio system provides sound enhancement, wind reduction, active noise compensation, and echo cancellation. Simply put, the headset lets you enjoy clear, crisp conversations. Plus, with four hours of talk time and three full days of standby battery life, staying in touch is easier than ever.

The MoGo Talk XD headset is easy to use, thanks to its simple, one-button operation. And if you have multiple phones, you can utilize the headset's multi-device pairing technology to connect up to five devices.

COMFORTABLE HEADSET, STORES AND CHARGES IN THE CASE
Thanks to a SoundShape ear tip, the headset's ear buds naturally fit the contours of your inner ear, while the headset itself is adjustable to fit the shape of your face. The ear tip provides more than 15 dB of passive noise cancellation, blocking ambient noise and offering a rich audio experience with full bass response. Storage and charging is easy--the MoGo's headset boom collapses flat--to a thin 5 millimeters--and snaps right into the case.

RUGGED CASE PROTECTS YOUR IPHONE 4
The Slim MoGo Grip Case is made out of hard polycarbonate, providing a protective shell for your iPhone that is both durable and stylish. The felt lining adds cushioning, while the shock-absorbing, soft-touch edge grip offers a secure hold. Controls and connectors remain fully accessible when using the case.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
MoGo Talk XD Bluetooth Headset iPhone 4, MoGo Dock protective case, SoundShape ear tips (6 sizes), quick-start guide, and Micro USB charging cable.
feature_bullets: Exclusive custom designed iPhone 4 case with integrated Mogo Talk XD headset
Talk time up to four hours with standby time of three days
SmartAudio speech enhancement for clear crisp calls
SoundShape eartip design blocks up to 15dB of ambient noise and provides a comfortable customizable fit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars51 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Works Great w/ iPhone, Crystal Clear Conversations; Pairs with up to 5 devices, Superior Comfort & Secure Fit, Headset & Case; Comes With starter Guide, Gripped Case
